column1: paragraphs  A6,  C.1.3,  C.2.4.1  and  D.9.2.1,  from  the  draft

column3: There exists beach erosion during the South West monsoon;
It has been a long standing issue in the area;

The  proposed  offshore  breakwaters  are  expected 
to  mitigate 
the  coastal
erosion during the South West monsoon;
The breakwaters may lead to the establishment of wider coastal area and sand
